text:
@realDonaldTrump Just because you want states to reopen for business doesn’t mean it’s the right or proper thing to do.

45,000 Americans are dead due to your massive and complete failure to take any of this seriously. Seniors are among the hardest hit. 5% of those sickened by covid19 die.
